name: highfive
actor_no_arg: You jump in the air and give a BIG high five to...umm...absolutely nothing.
others_no_arg: $n wildly high fives the air, looking very foolish -- very foolish indeed.
actor_found_target: You jump in the air and give a BIG high five to $N!
target_found: $n gives you a BIG high five!  Way to go!!
others_auto: $n tries to high five $mself, but ends up looking foolish instead.
